experiments.stimuli:
Describe how you would handle a situation if you were required to finish multiple tasks by the end of the day, and there was no conceivable way that you could finish them. 

SpongeBob SquarePants is a cute, cuddly, yellow, well-dressed sea sponge who is optimistic, friendly, nice, happy, loyal, funny, hard-woking, outgoing, selfless, sweet, innocent, forgiving, and very good-natured, and loves to have fun and silly. In a variety of episodes, he is seen as fairly intelligent and very capable, even though his silliness and his naive and annoying traits cause him to seem less intelligent than he truly is.

As the transit point in the drug trade between the Golden Triangle and Bangkok, the village has different drugs circulating among the population, including among its youth. Glue-sniffing is rampant, snaring children as young as six. 

I still remember sitting in Panera Bread chatting about relationships when my friend said casually, as though there's simply no denying it, Krysti, no one likes being single.

I still remember sitting in Panera Bread chatting about relationships when my friend said casually, as though there's simply no denying it, Krysti, no one likes being single. 

As the transit point in the drug trade between the Golden Triangle and Bangkok, the village has different drugs circulating among the population, including among its youth. Glue-sniffing is rampant, snaring children as young as six.

In a remote village in Phetchabun, a northern Thai province, where most residents are of the Hmong ethnic minority, life is hard and occasionally dark. 

As the transit point in the drug trade between the Golden Triangle and Bangkok, the village has different drugs circulating among the population, including among its youth. Glue-sniffing is rampant, snaring children as young as six.

Even though I believed this with the core of my being—and I desperately wanted my high school students to hear this truth—I said most of this to my shoes. Because I knew this wasn't a point of view I'm supposed to have, especially in the Church. 

I laughed it off, but I was more hurt than I realized. Driving home, I kept thinking, You don't get to tell me how I feel. You don't get to tell me what I can and can't like. I wasn't angry at my friend, but at society. Because here's a shocker: I like being single.

Give me an example of a time you did something wrong. How did you handle it? 

If you were at a business lunch and you ordered a rare steak and they brought it to you well done, what would you do? Please elaborate in the space provided.

Tell me about a time where 

his naive and annoying traits cause him to seem less intelligent than he truly is.

Describe how you would handle 

operating out of a concrete building located next to a graveyard

Amid these sad stories, 

he proves to be very likable and a good sponge to have as a friend or to talk to.

SpongeBob SquarePants is a cute, cuddly, yellow, 

which shows that he is an overall very likable person

where most residents are of the Hmong ethnic minority

I knew this wasn't a point of view I'm supposed to have

The 17,000-strong village, called Khek Noi, is impoverished, and the villagers are poorly educated.
